Title: ↩️ What is known about the situation in the Kursk region: ▪️Units...
Description: TASS: The Ukrainian Armed Forces lost more than 350 military personnel and 13 armored vehicles in the Kursk direction in one day. The total enemy losses during the entire battle exceeded 12,200 people killed and wounded, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported. Russian aviation defeated concentrations of forces and equipment... What is known about the situation in the Kursk region:▪️Units of the 'North' group, with the support of army aviation and artillery fire, repelled an enemy counterattack in the direction of the settlement of Apanasovka.▪️The Russian military also thwarted attempts by Ukrainian attacks in the direction of populated areas Cherkasy Konopelka, Borki and Fanaseevka.▪️Russian aviation struck areas where foreign mercenaries and Ukrainian reserves were concentrated in the Sumy region.▪️During the day, enemy losses amounted to more than 350 military personnel and 13 armored vehicles.▪️In total, during the hostilities, Kyiv lost more than 12,200 military personnel, 96 tanks, 42 infantry fighting vehicles and 77 armored personnel carriers.▪️According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, 10 Ukrainian servicemen were captured.▪️The Russian military in the Kursk region liberated about 10 settlements, Apty Alaudinov told TASS.▪️The preliminary amount of damage caused to the agro-industrial complex of the Kursk region due to the massive attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces is estimated 85 billion rubles, follows from the report of the acting governor of the region Smirnova.
